title: Don't buy it if you wanna live free without backpain.
body: I bought this sofa cum bed and have been using it for almost 2 months now. The product is good but the material or the cushioning is very bad. title: 'waste of money -do not buy'
body: just a PU foam - not a sofa or not a bed. hence at all comfortable- just easy to move as no weight. they have wrapped a basic foam which we can see inside TV or other electronic item's box to save products from shocks... it got pressed within 20 days and couldnt return also. just put 3-4k extra and get actual sofa at least that will be comfortable or may last for long also. this is not at all worth for 8K.

title: 'Good fabric quality color and foam quality'
body: Good, fabric quality, color and foam quality. Light weighted, soft cushion. This product is worth the price. I am writing a review for 1st time. You can very well make an idea how well this Product has fit place. You won't get anything better than in this price.

title: 'Best product at this price point'
body: 'Went through many online and offline but purchased this one and now after using it for more than 6months I can definitely say this is one of the best purchases of recent time.  Top USP: Sofa cum bed can be used in 3formats. It has one side firm and other side soft so you can use it as per your comfort level. They gave three pillows with cover those are equally great.  Finally I must say seventh heaven bran must get more visibility as they are doing really great.  From the customer support to an amazing product I found them really great.  Will be highly recommending this product.  PS: Best part their hand made notes which comes with the amazing packaging. Kudos to Team.'
